description:
Cycling season can go longer than you’d think with these gloves. Wind-resistant fabric protects your digits, helping you cruise through chilly gusts.Backs of hands are wind-resistant bonded soft shell material with a DWR finish to shed light precipitation.Faux-suede palms are abrasion resistant.Interior and cuffs are soft brushed fleece with a wicking finish.Sniffle patches on thumbs are a great alternative to snot rockets.Precurved fingers provide great dexterity.Touchscreen conductive patches on thumbs and forefingers so you can check your Strava segments.3M reflective details and a reflective print keep you visible on night training missions.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: MEC Firestarter Gloves - Unisex
